summary: Adaptable and friendly Case Worker and team player with comprehensive background in crisis intervention utilizing motivational interviewing techniques. Ability to interact with a diverse population with a compassionate demeanor.Excellent interpersonal skills Strong communicator Culturally-sensitive Self-starter Skilled multi-tasker Fast learner Detail-oriented

experience.title: Case Manager/Outreach Advocate
experience.description: Case Manager/Outreach Advocate responsibilities included entering daily client data in the Integrated Tracking System, maintaining confidentiality, answering hotline calls, preparing outreach presentations, and maintaining client files; led a cell phone collection program for survivors; assisted up to 15 survivors per week with goal setting and connecting to services; monitored progress with service providers; conducted monthly home visits; served as 24-hour on-call crisis responder; spoke publicly to Fort Bend County community and schools; coordinated with housing/employment specialists; provided crisis intervention and advocacy; conducted casework on goals, benefits, education, employment, and transportation; oversaw client transportation, programs for women, and access to community resources; documented and maintained client files; acted as child and legal advocate; maintained weekly contact for safety planning; participated in fundraising and advocacy activities; provided victim information and referrals; demonstrated leadership and problem solving.

experience.title: Texas Works Advisor I
experience.description: Determined and re-evaluated eligibility for Food Stamps, Medicaid and TANF; interviewed ~30 clients daily, documented data, and verified benefits; explained program benefits to clients; reviewed ongoing eligibility; promoted self-sufficiency through coaching and counseling; maintained client files; referred clients to outside social service providers; built rapport with law enforcement, courts, and community service agencies; referred clients to mental health resources and family members to support options; communicated with local agencies, schools, churches, courts and employers regarding client involvement; prepared mail, faxes, and organized client files.

experience.title: Call Center Representative
experience.description: Answered multi-line phones, routed calls; scheduled appointments; assisted clients with problem solving; aided office efficiency with copying and faxing.
